description: I think that this app is great and educational, but it is WAY too noisy even without the music. The developers should definitely make a volume controller in the app.
summary: It's OK, would recommend to those that do not mind about loud noises

description: Was a great typing tutor app until a recent update or something changed the language of the whole program to some weird Eastern European one or similar. So annoying!
summary: In a different language now, unusable!

good good good
